column1: celeb is a Sindarin word meaning "silver".
In the early pre-cursors of Sindarin (the languages Noldorin and Gnomish)
Other forms of the word include Noldorin celebren ("of silver" or "like silver"
column2: p. 25) and Sindarin celebrin ("like silver"). Didier Willis has suggested that the Noldorin form celevon means "of silver".Didier Willis
column3: http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary at http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com (accessed 19 June 2011)
